title: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive
description: Zombie Horde: Build & Survive is an intense action survival game where staying alive depends on a combination of strategy, well-timed decisions, and action. Build traps, guide your hero through relentless waves of the undead, and upgrade your gear regularly to keep up with the ever-growing number of zombies aimed at destroying you. Stay sharp and push your limits to see just how many zombies you can take on at once.
